Name: Ascended Hand of Power
Description:
Caster unit. Can use Crushing Gravity and Portal. Can be upgraded to use Frenzy.

Detector

Ascended:
+75 Life
+100% Energy Regeneration

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Splits into two identical clones that start with 40% life and damage. These clones have 2 regeneration and when they reach full life their damage is restored to 100%.
Root.Name: Fission

Root.Tooltip: Splits into two identical clones that start with 40% life and damage. These clones have 2 regeneration and when they reach full life their damage is restored to 100%.
Root.Name: Fission

Root.Tooltip: Splits into two identical clones that start with 40% life and damage. These clones have 2 regeneration and when they reach full life their damage is restored to 100%.
Root.Name: Fission

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Scan-moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Scan Move

Root.Tooltip:
Immobilizes units in the target area for up to 5 seconds. Forces air units to the ground and disables their abilities. Reveals cloaked and burrowed units.

Massive units are immune.
Root.Name: Crushing Gravity

Root.Tooltip: Biological units in the target area to go mad for 10 seconds. Increases attack and movement speed by 50% but reduces armor by 2 and prevents control.
Root.Name: Frenzy

Root.Tooltip:
Creates a portal entrance at the target location which teleports ground units that enter it to the next created portal exit. Lasts 14 seconds.

Massive units are immune.
Root.Name: Portal Entrance

Root.Tooltip: Activates the nearest inactive portal entrance in range linking it to the created portal exit.
Root.Name: Portal Exit

Root.Tooltip: This unit can detect cloaked, burrowed, and hallucinated units.
Root.Name: Detector

Behaviors.Tooltip: This Dragon is more powerful. If it dies in combat it will provide its owner with a small amount of Rage.
Behaviors.Name: Ascended
